content.query:
-- DROP TABLE andy.TransactionDetail

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects O JOIN sys.schemas S ON O.schema_id = S.schema_id WHERE O.NAME = 'TransactionDetail' AND O.TYPE = 'U' AND S.NAME = 'andy')
CREATE TABLE andy.TransactionDetail
	(
	 [CustomerRetailID] uniqueidentifier,
	 [TransactionHeaderID] uniqueidentifier,
	 [ProductRetailID] uniqueidentifier,
	 [Quantity] bigint,
	 [ListPrice] float,
	 [DiscountAmount] float,
	 [Tax] float,
	 [ShippingCost] float,
	 [TotalAmount] float
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = HASH(TransactionHeaderID),
	 CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	 -- HEAP
	)
GO

--Uncomment the 4 lines below to create a stored procedure for data pipeline orchestrationâ€‹
--CREATE PROC bulk_load_TransactionDetail
--AS
--BEGIN
COPY INTO andy.TransactionDetail
(CustomerRetailID 1, TransactionHeaderID 2, ProductRetailID 3, Quantity 4, ListPrice 5, DiscountAmount 6, Tax 7, ShippingCost 8, TotalAmount 9)
FROM 'https://andyrobretailstor.dfs.core.windows.net/datalake/andyrob/raw/RetailTransactionDetails.csv'
WITH
(
	FILE_TYPE = 'CSV'
	,MAXERRORS = 0
	,FIRSTROW = 2
	,ERRORFILE = 'https://andyrobretailstor.dfs.core.windows.net/datalake/'
	,IDENTITY_INSERT = 'OFF'
)
--END
GO

SELECT TOP 100 * FROM andy.TransactionDetail
GO

DBCC PDW_SHOWSPACEUSED('andy.TransactionDetail');
